name: The Amazing Death Race
description:
Hope you find the lie :) Welcome to our platformer/shooter game ;) Controls

To move right press the D or Right Arrow key

To jump press W or UP

To zoom out hold Z

To shoot press Q or Space

Note

The in browser game seems to be lagging at times(especially with the sounds). If you prefer a smoother experience, we recommend using the respective platform download option.

Did you spot the lie ? [SPOILERS AHEAD]

Well maybe there is a red portal you need to go into, and that the game show for fame and riches is a lie. You need to meet the resistance and help them beat the drones. Go towards the red portal ;) (or just ignore the warnings)

Still dint find the shooter level ?

Well the resistance doesnt really want you if you cant face the giant red danger head on. Sorry.
